name: Infiniflow
description:
The game is an infinite platformer. In the game you are a music note that's trying to survive for the most amount of time.

Try survive for the most amount of time without dying and see after the game if you broke your high score.

this is a jam game but we worked hard for it, so please download and leave feedback.

How to Play:

Jump with space/arrow/w/mouse

Jump with the beat to make the some of the spikes dissapear

Yair Mizrachi - Coding and Level Design : https://yair-mizrachi.itch.io/

José Granado - Art and Level Design: https://lumagalaxy.itch.io/

Capacraft - Music:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCVPiuV-NhGqW9nMCJ4vdHg
